alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 3:47AM MST until January 07 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, with the highest amounts on the benches. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County and Northern Wasatch Front. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front
